programme.title: You Deserve A Break 2 - EP 4
programme.desc: 64-year-old Eddie Lee was surprised with a holiday but he did not want to go - leaving his deaf-mute brother behind. So he's off on a bonding trip with his brother to Hanoi! He wanted to take his brother to a place with night markets and food. They taste the wonderful food and egg coffee and navigate through the crowded bylanes to get special silk shirts tailored. They end the day with a fun musical evening - the Vietnamese way!

programme.title: The Enchantimals: Tales From Everwilde - EP 1

The young goalkeeper sets out to find and recruit members for his soccer team.

Will they succeed? Find out in Museum Mysteries!

(PG-部分画面令人不安)(重)光辉始终无法原谅从小抛弃他的母亲碧霞，小虎教碧霞用上吊自杀的苦肉计，不料却弄巧反拙，害得碧霞差点丧命。光辉见碧霞昏迷不醒，真情流露，可是等碧霞醒来之后，他却恢复冷淡的样子，仍旧不肯原谅母亲。.

programme.title: 第一主角 The Lead - EP 12

The furious An Ya chided Ah Zhen for her incompetency. Ah Zhen retaliates. (PG)(重)光辉与安雅去唱卡拉OK，阿真当"烟幕弹"为他们掩护，却发现记者到来。她想起德平和碧霞的话，一时起私心，没有及时通报光辉与安雅躲避，让记者拍到两人拍拖的照片。安雅气恼地大骂阿真办事不力，阿真反驳，两人闹翻。.

programme.desc: (R) Singaporeans don't often think of themselves as islanders. But the outlying islands are rich in cultural and social history. (重)新加坡原本由70多个岛屿组成，现在只剩下44个。在这些仅存的岛屿当中，你熟悉的会有几个？ 圣约翰岛曾经是英国殖民地中，最大的检疫站；乌敏采石场东南一公里外的小镇，是岛上最热闹的地方；2014年，新加坡在南部岛屿，建立了第一个海洋生态园。 想对新加坡本岛以外的岛屿有更深一层的认识，就不要错过了《我们的岛屿》。.

programme.title: 一切从昏睡开始 While You Were Away - EP 12
programme.desc: (R) Sen Mei and Guan Ming meets a client who pressures them to drink. Xia Luo Ke sends the photos of them drinking to Zi Jun and Zi Jun's face darkens. He decides to wait for her downstairs and sees Guan Ming sending Sen Mei home. Zi Jun brings Sen Mei back home, both parties blame one another and starts an argument. Zi Jun accuses Sen Mei of having an affair with Guang Ming and Sen Mei is taken aback. (PG)(重)森美与冠铭见客户，为应酬而不得已喝酒。夏洛克将两人喝酒的照片传给子骏，子骏脸色一沉，到楼下等待，果然见到冠铭送森美回来。子骏带森美回家，夫妻俩互相指责，最后吵起来。子骏脱口说出森美与冠铭有染之事，森美感错愕！.

programme.title: 詹姆士出走料理 James' Going Places - EP 7
programme.desc: Join James, the host with outstanding culinary skills and an appetite for good food, as he explores markets and savours local delicacies. He will also showcase new cooking methods, and eventually present a creative dish. 云林有全台湾最大的蔬果市场，有70%的蔬菜都来自于它。而每一种蔬菜的采收方式都不一样，为了拿到最新鲜的食材，詹姆士亲自体验采收蔬菜。令人惊讶的不只是这些，你有吃过内藏干贝的碗粿吗？霸王级的碗粿、一瓶要价1900元的酱油、夜来香花竟然是可以吃的？这些不可思议的新发现，都让詹姆士惊叹连连。.

programme.title: 剃头刀 阿签传奇 Titoudao: Inspired by the True Story of a Wayang Star - EP 1
programme.desc: Ah Chiam who grew up in a village, was often beaten up and scolded by her father, who suspects that Ah Chiam was born after the Japanese Army sexually assaulted his wife. (PG-部分画面令人不安)生长在农村的阿签从小不被父亲喜爱，经常遭打骂，因父亲怀疑她是妻子遭日军性侵后所生下来的，甚至想把她丢弃或卖掉，只有妈妈维护和经常鼓励她。但妈妈却在生产时难产而死，父亲将气发泄在阿签身上，指她给这个家带来不幸，将她赶走……。.

(重)你知道吗？义顺新镇的前身叫“财启村”，而大牌 101是义顺新镇的第一栋组屋。以前的黄梨山，现在变成户外乐园，还有世界唯一的活龟博物馆。三巴旺曾经是英国皇家的军事重地，著名的地标除了英殖民地时期留下来的黑白屋，还有售卖手工糕饼的传统饼家。.

(重)《歌手2018》与往季竞演结束后统一投票的操作方式有所不同，本季光临现场的大众听审们有两次机会行使投票权力，而新增的这一次机会是“预投票”环节。“预投票”环节，是指500位大众听审在前四位出场歌手中选择一名进行一轮“预投票”。该节目的首发歌手为汪峰、Jessie J、李圣杰、张韶涵、GAI、张天、李晓东；补位歌手为李泉、华晨宇、腾格尔、郁可唯；踢馆歌手为苏诗丁、KZ·谭定安、霍尊，由张韶涵担任该节目的首位女性音乐串讲人。.

programme.title: 旅游陷阱 Holiday Gone Wrong - EP 2
programme.desc: (R)(Dual Language - Mandarin and English) Holiday Gone Wrong brings viewers through the stories of eight overseas holidays which had gone awry. Through re-enactments and interviews, victims share compelling first-hand accounts of their ordeals - of either being kidnapped, robbed, or scammed of their money and belongings. At the end of each episode, relevant spokespersons will share with viewers various precautionary measures one could take when caught in similar situations. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/英)《旅游陷阱》将通过搬演片段为观众带来惊险旅游故事。受害者也会献身讲述当时的恐怖经历，其中将包括在途中被绑架，打抢及诈骗等。到节目的尾声，专家也会向观众分享如何在遇到类似情况时，采取好防护措施。.

programme.title: 地球的孤儿 Orphans Of The Earth - EP 8

programme.title: 好货驾到 Deals For Joy - EP 26
programme.desc: Is there really a tumbler that can maintain the temperature of your hot and cold drinks for a long time? Find out how amazing this tumbler is. 真的有长效保冷以及储热的杯子吗？一起看看它有多神奇。.

programme.title: 好货驾到 Deals For Joy - EP 15
programme.desc: A durable non-stick frying pan is a kitchen must-have! 日本技术Evercook锅组 - 用不粘锅具组做无油料理，为你的健康加分！.

programme.title: 台湾1001个故事 3 Taiwan's 1001 Stories 3 - EP 11
programme.desc: Hosted by Bai Xinyi, this food programme introduces Taiwan's traditional cuisines and their ingredients and spices. It also discloses touching stories behind the cuisines. 介绍台湾在地食材的故事，也是台湾最深刻的人生故事。故事的主角们，有的为着有机农业奋斗打拼，为这片土地奉献青春与血汗。 有的则是经过千百次的调味与尝试，只为了成就一道美味料理。对比着经营者与料理人的故事，他们或是为生活中年转业、或是离乡背井追寻梦想，人生路上各自遭逢百转千折的冲突与适应，才能在逆境中成功蜕变。.

programme.title: 人间蒸发 Missing - EP 1
programme.desc: In South Korea, there are about 600 children under 18 years old, who have been missing for long term. The distressed parents travelled the whole nation distributing flyers and putting up banners, trying everything to find their loved one. However, it was to no avail even after 30 years of searching. 孩子失踪了，怎么办？韩国有大约600个，年龄低于18岁、长期失踪的孩子。他们的父母虽然活在等待和内疚之中，却心存希望的上网、派传单、挂布条，辛苦地找下去。有些家长找了30年、生了病，孩子仍然了无音讯。.

programme.title: 天上的约定 The Promise - EP 63
programme.desc: Ep 53:Shizhen is worried that Yingshu will tell Jingwan about his relationship with Nayan one day. She thus abandons Yingshu at a park on purpose. Nayan is informed of Yingshu's whereabouts. She sends Yingshu to the Bais' residence and requests for Chengzhu to take care of her. Ep 53: 世珍担心英淑有一天会对敬莞说出娜妍是他的女儿的秘密，于是故意把英淑带到公园，然后独自离开。娜妍的眼线通知她英淑被抛弃。娜妍于是将英淑送到白家去，拜托成珠照顾英淑。.

programme.title: 我的契约老公吴先生 My Contracted Husband, Mr Oh - EP 17
programme.desc: Ep 17Shengzhu informs her mother that she has decided to quit her job to move to the mountains with Zuodou and thus cannot give her allowance in future. Her mother is vexed. Shengzhu's good friends Shimi and Jingshu are surprised to find out about Shengzhu's plan to live in the mountains with Zuodou and her decision to give up on filming the documentary.They hold different views about her decisions. Ep 18Eric confesses his love to Shengzhu but she turns him down. At the same time, she info Ep 17胜珠去找母亲向她表示要结束工作，到山里和作斗生活，所以以后不能再给生活费了。胜珠的母亲因此十分生气。世弥和景淑知道胜珠想和作斗到山上住，并放弃拍摄记录片后，对胜珠的决定有不同的看法。Ep 18艾瑞克向胜珠告白，却被她拒绝了。胜珠还向他辞掉拍摄吴赫纪录片的工作。作斗偶然见到胜泰与母亲来找胜珠，听见他们谈及胜泰欠款快要坐牢，要逼胜珠卖山地或房产来救弟弟的事。.

programme.title: 一起生活吧 Marry Me Now - EP 15
programme.desc: Qinshou's mother goes to Xiaoxie's shoe store and makes a fuss in the shop. She demands that Xiaoxie break up Shanhe's and Qinshou's relationship. Xiaoxie is disappointed with her. 庆守的妈妈到孝燮的鞋店大闹一番。 要求孝燮阻止善荷与庆守在一起，孝燮对她感到失望。.

programme.title: 一起生活吧 Marry Me Now - EP 16
programme.desc: Zaiheng overheard that Wenzhi is not Meilians biological son. Meantime, Enxiu who has a rare blood group needs a transfusion; Youhe anxiously looks for a donor. 在亨无意间听到文植並不是美莲亲生儿子。与此同时， 恩秀需要紧急输血而她的血型是稀有群，宥荷着急到处寻找捐赠者。.

programme.title: For Food's Sake! S2 - EP 1
programme.desc: The prices of fishball and squid have shot up more than other foods in the last 10 years. Chef Ming Tan hunts down what's driving these price hikes and turns up some unexpected reasons. 主持人到世界各地了解食物价格上涨的因素，让聪明的消费者对盘中物的价格有更深的了解。.

programme.title: 再创世纪 Another Era - EP 19
programme.desc: Qitang mentions of going to Switzerland to recuperate. Gaozhe brings up the topic of the Lantau power station project, which interests Dinguao. Gaoxhe and Dingyao compete for the Lantau Island project. 启堂为康复提出到瑞士休养。高哲提出大屿山发电站项目，定垚被打动。两人将对大屿山项目展开争夺战。.

programme.title: News Tonight - EP 47
programme.desc: A comprehensive half-hour news programme, NEWS TONIGHT provides viewers with important local, international and financial developments for the day. U频道《晚间新闻》，在半小时里除深入报道本地与国际要闻，还有详尽的财经新闻和体坛动态。世界局势与经济动脉，让大家轻松掌握。.

programme.desc: Ayuh Sihat Bersama S4 is an info-ed series aimed at helping viewers to stay healthy, helps them understand and keep up to date with the latest health advisories. programme.title: Projek Showcase - EP 7
programme.desc: Programme is not available for live streaming. Episode 7: Potret - Seri Wahyuni JaesThis heavy family drama is about the lives of three sisters, related through the voice (autobiographical style) of one of them, about the injustice she faces due to her parents' unfair treatment towards her.Zulkifli and Saemah have three daughters - Zainah, Zarra and Zila - with totally clashing personalities. Zainah, the eldest, is a high-flying manager at an investment company. Zila, the youngest, works in the glamourous world of advertising. Zarra, whose voice is behind the narration of the drama, works in the kitchen of a bakery. Being very image conscious, their parents favour Zainah and Zila while they belittle Zarra for being the 'black-sheep' to their otherwise 'picture-perfect' family.Zulkifli and Saemah sell their house to invest in Zainah's husband's business only to be driven out of their home. Unable to live with Zila, they ask to move in with Zarra the daughter whom they alwa.

programme.title: Hey Mr Spotlight - EP 9
programme.desc: When her school results deteriorate, Hazri becomes worried and decided to get his good friend Azraf to be his sister Raisya's tuition teacher. Reluctantly, he agreed to the offer but Raisya was against it. They had a rough journey together when Raisya's prone to arguing with Azraf which always leads him to lose his patience. Though frequently disagreeing with each other, unknowingly, Azraf has secretly set his eyes on Raisya without her realising it. Y is disappointed upon hearing Raisya is already engaged to Azraf.He felt cheated with Raisya for using him as bait, simply for her to get close with Azraf.Meanwhile, Hazri and Farhana's relationship comes to an end when Farhana decides to break it off.

programme.title: Anakku Duniaku
programme.desc: Programme is not available for live streaming. Anakku Duniaku is a telemovie depicting three stories portraying facets of motherhood within the facets of Singapore lifestyle. The story revolves around three different mothers from different social status weaved through a central platform of Social Service. All 3 stories evolve and intersect at the Social Service Centre as a common meeting ground. Through this common ground of social service, the characters regardless of their social status discover their strengths and weaknesses to stand together to overcome their adversities. In its resolve, the mothers find a solution for their adversities through their strong motherly instinct.

programme.title: Isteri Dalam Sangkar - EP 3
programme.desc: Aisyah meets Iskandar for the first time when her bicycle collides with his car. Ros and Irham are worried for Aisyah when they see her bruises from the accident. Mak Su and Fasha excitedly heads to a birthday party leaving Aisyah and Farid alone at home. Siti Aisyah lives with her aunt and cousins after her parents' death. Her best friend, Ros advises her to leave the house quickly after noticing bruises on her. Tengku Iskandar receives a warning from his father that if he refuses to change to become a better person, he will not be able to take over TG Holdings.

programme.title: Dia Yang Ku Cinta - EP 4
programme.desc: Cempaka and her brother Iman are stepchildren of Tuan Khalid and Marhanna. However Marhanna and her daughter Lara Andrew hated the two siblings and often abused them. They pretended to be kind in the presence of Tuan Khalid and Hafiz Andrew. Both Hafiz and Lara are also stepchildren of Tuan Khalid. They are the children of Marhanna and her ex-husband, an English man. Cempaka decided to leave the house but her love for Hafiz prevented her from leaving the house. What will happen to them? Iman died from the fall. The family failed to contact Amna until later when Hafiz finally persuaded Amna to come back. Khalid fainted when he heard commotion between Marhanna and Amna. Both Marhanna and Lara chased Amna away from the house after Khalid passed away. Amna rejected Hafiz proposal for marriage as she is aware that Marhanna hated her.

programme.desc: Kembara Kasih 2 (A Journey of Love 2)Kembara Kasih visits five different Southeast Asian countries to explore and pull for five different charitable causes. Captured as a personal account through first-hand experiences and he touching stories of real locals. Kembara Kasih takes our celebrity host, Dalina Jaapar, different third world countries to explore and support four different charitable causes. Experience her joys, fears and tears as we watch her volunteer with fellow Singaporean volunteers to accomplish challenging tasks such as building water systems, reaching out to people with cleft lip, encouraging dumpsite children to go to school, and helping street children get a future. Will she succeed? What obstacles will she encounter? Will she give up? Most importantly, what difference will she make? And what can she learn from the other volunteers?

programme.title: Ingat Tak,Mak?
programme.desc: Programme is not available for live streaming. Ingat Tak, Mak? is about a mother's sacrifice at the expense of being misunderstood and hated by her only daughter all her life. Abused and ill-treated by her alcoholic and gambling addict husband, Habibah leaves home with her young daughter, to spare her of an abusive father and to give her a chance to break out of their poverty-stricken lives. Alone with no money, she struggles to raise her daughter until she meets her second husband who rescues the family.

programme.title: Isteri Dalam Sangkar - EP 5
programme.desc: Aisyah and Iskandar are caught for close proximity. Iskandar has no other choice but to marry Aisyah to avoid smearing his family's name. He promises Aisyah to make her life a torture after their marriage. Siti Aisyah lives with her aunt and cousins after her parents' death. Her best friend, Ros advises her to leave the house quickly after noticing bruises on her. Tengku Iskandar receives a warning from his father that if he refuses to change to become a better person, he will not be able to take over TG Holdings.

programme.title: My Coffee Prince - EP 27
programme.desc: Adapted from Korea's most popular drama series, Coffee Prince tell the story of four young people who meet together at a cafe as they navigate through love, life and their dreams.Raikal is a smart young man who hates the idea of being tied down to one career. Reluctant to join the family business, he is ordered by his grandmother to manage a cafe. Though reluctant to run the cafe, he slowly begins to immerse himself in the gourmet coffee business. Everything changes in a spilt moment when Raikal's grandmother wants Dani to go to Italy to learn and become a good barista for two years.Though keen, she hesitates to leave her mother and Ira just to fulfill her dream. She then decides not to proceed with the plan.

programme.title: Poskad Dari Alhambra - EP 11

Would Jose be able to steer her through this emotional ordeal?

programme.title: Skuad Cilik 2 - EP 8

programme.title: Bantal Buruk Saloma - EP 5
programme.desc: BANTAL BURUK SALOMA is a social drama about foster parenting that centres around family, life, love and forming relationships that lasts a lifetime. But it comes with serious challenges, especially when Aidilfitri approaches. Aidilfitri is a happy time for most kids. But for kids in orphanage or foster care, it is not easy. Some miss their parents. Lutfi is getting treatment but he could not be saved. Soon, Lutfi passes on and leaves Zaid and Rahmah utterly distraught. Zaid blames himself and becomes a changed man, leaving Rahmah and the kids baffled by his new behaviour. Meanwhile, Rafi and Suraya start to argue as to whether they should let Saloma meet with her mother since they are worried she might find out about Saloma's mother's condition. This leads to them falling out when Suraya insists Saloma should visit her mom. Saloma brings her ‘Bantal Buruk Saloma’ for her mom. Saloma’s mother thanks Suraya and Rafi for taking such good care of Saloma. Just as Saloma is connecting with her mom, Saloma’s mom passes away, leaving Saloma broken and distraught….

programme.desc: Drama about Sofiya who has to live with her aunt after the death of her p parents. Umi Khadijah does not know that her husband Kamil has an evil intentions against Sofiya. He instigated Tasriq to hate Sofiya. Then one day, Umi Khatijah is shocked when she heard Sofiya missing while swimming in the river. Kifli found Sofiya while fishing and brought her home. He decided to adopt her after she cannot remember her family. Unfortunately, Sofiya has a life-threatening illness. Alysa is surprised to know she is going to be engaged with Tashriq that day. Kamil has secretly peep into Khadijah’s house and see their happiness from far. He regrets his mistakes and has come back with his wife whom he neglected. Meanwhile Arif meets Della whom he believes shared the same revenge as him. This is after Arif sees Della following Tashriq’s car. Both plan to ruin Alysa and Tashriq relationship.

programme.title: Hak Siapa - EP 2
programme.desc: Syariah law in Singapore today helps to resolve cases, covering different aspects of marriage, divorces, ancillary matters, custody and inheritance for the Muslim community. However, many will instead relate the Syariah law and court as messy, complex, complicated and emotionally draining; a long and tedious process that may impact the children. And because the issues discussed are sensitive, many tend to shy away from sharing their understanding or misunderstanding of the court and its process. Razak was supportive at first when Murni started to go back to work. He became jealous when Murni got reconnected with her friends, and soon became hooked on social media. Razak divorced Murni via text messages.

After 1 year in Kuala Lumpur, Luqman returns to his village announcing that he is now a qualified pilot. Zia is happy of his achievement and cannot wait to marry him. But what they don't know is that Luqman has been lying to all of them just to fulfil his fantasy of becoming a pilot.

programme.title: Ayuh Sihat Bersama S4 - EP 7
programme.desc: Ayuh Sihat Bersama S4 in an info-ed series aimed at helping viewers to stay healthy, helps them understand and keep up to date with the latest health advisories. The programme will feature exercise routines by Wan Shamsury, healthy recipes by Chef Bob, doctor's interview with Dr Muhammad Iqbal Abdullah and skit segment with Suhaimi Yusof and Khairudin Samsudin. This series is anchored by Shahril Wahid.

programme.title: Empat Penjuru - EP 7
programme.desc: Salmah is admitted to the hospital after fainting at home. Along starts questioning his father of his whereabouts when his mum was alone at home. Along decides to call off his family's holiday plans when their flight departure time gets delayed several times. Uda gets frustrated while teaching Angah's new girlfriend, Monica how to weave a ketupat.

programme.title: Hey Mr Spotlight - EP 13
programme.desc: When her school results deteriorate, Hazri becomes worried and decided to get his good friend Azraf to be his sister Raisya's tuition teacher. Reluctantly, he agreed to the offer but Raisya was against it. They had a rough journey together when Raisya's prone to arguing with Azraf which always leads him to lose his patience. Though frequently disagreeing with each other, unknowingly, Azraf has secretly set his eyes on Raisya without her realising it.

programme.title: Mat So'od
programme.desc: Mat So'od is the village entertainer. Contrary to his career, Matt So'od is a moody person in nature. Samsiah, Mat So'od's lover, has always been passionate and wants to marry him. But Samsiah's parents are puzzled about Mat So'od's strange behaviour and worried that their daughter will suffer after marrying him. Cast: Khir Rahman, Siti Saleha, Harun Hashim, Lydiawati, Fauzuly Hamdan, Syed Zalihafe.

programme.title: Isteri Dalam Sangkar - EP 7
programme.desc: Aisyah pleads to Iskandar not to let her go even though he has promised her that he will make her life miserable. Iskandar wants Waiduri to inform his mother to call off their wedding plans. After getting fired from TG Holdings, Rey looks for Iskandar in hopes that he is able to borrow a loan for his mother's operation. Siti Aisyah lives with her aunt and cousins after her parents' death. Her best friend, Ros advises her to leave the house quickly after noticing bruises on her. Tengku Iskandar receives a warning from his father that if he refuses to change to become a better person, he will not be able to take over TG Holdings.

programme.title: Ceria Ramadan - EP 7
programme.desc: It portrays how the Malay community celebrating fasting month during Covid 19. Unlike the previous Ramadan, they are not able to visit the mosque as all mosques are closed. Bazaar including Geylang Bazaar and all bazaars on the island are not allowed to take place. The Singaporeans can only leave the house for essential needs. Ceria Ramadan helps the community to adapt themselves during the Circuit Breaker. The programme consists of a chat, skit and an outside event. It is sponsored by MUIS.

programme.desc: We visit Okuizumo, Shimane. Terraced paddies in the 400-meter hills host pond loaches, newts, and giant water bugs that are now scarce in other parts of Japan.

programme.title: South of the Border
programme.desc: The teams head into Mexico ahead of race day with enough time for things to go wrong and no time to panic. With the start of the Baja 1000 just five days away, the teams are all in Ensenada, Mexico for the moment they've all been working toward. In the hours before the race starts something always goes wrong. Which teams can power through and overcome?

programme.title: Custom Lines in Lillooet
programme.desc: Brandon Semenuk and his friends tame the wild terrain of Lillooet, BC, Canada into custom MTB trails. Armed with shovels and pup tents, Brandon Semenuk and his friends camp out in Lillooet, BC, Canada to tame the wild terrain into custom MTB trails. After scouting the zone and digging out dirt jumps and slopestyle lines, the guys test the new course.

programme.title: The Snake Den
programme.desc: In a former moto zone, Brandon Semenuk and Graham Agassiz lead a crew to build a new run called the Snake Den. In a former moto zone, Brandon Semenuk and buddy Graham Agassiz lead a crew to build a new run called the Snake Den. After scoping out the turf on motorbikes, the guys transform a terrain of dirt and fallen trees into a figure-eight MTB course.

programme.title: South to Sian
programme.desc: Harrison Roach and Zye Norris set out to see if the dream of a true pioneering surf adventure is still alive. On boards, on bikes, by boat and four-wheel drive, Harrison Roach and Zye Norris’s journey is to discover if, in these days of GPS and WiFi, the dream of a true pioneering surf adventure is still possible.

programme.title: Project Acheron: Patagonia
programme.desc: Four high performance athletes push their limits as they hike, kayak and climb through spectacular terrain. Explore the physical and spiritual challenges faced by four athletes trekking through the wild terrain of Patagonia. The individual athletes undergo a transformation as they gel with former Navy SEALs to become a strong team.

programme.title: Skydives and Freefalls
programme.desc: It's time for Bryce's team-mate Jack to get over his fear of heights – by indoor skydiving! Bryce helps teammate Jack get over his fear of heights by taking him indoor skydiving in Las Vegas. Upping the stakes, Bryce calls on the Red Bull Air Force to help them jump out of an actual plane. Will Jack be able to handle the pressure?

programme.title: Stormy Weather at X Games
programme.desc: Bryce Menzies touches down in Spain to race rallycross at the Barcelona X Games. Bryce Menzies touches down in Spain to race rallycross at the Barcelona X Games. Before the race, the crew enjoys the Spanish culture and nightlife. When a storm rolls in and turns the course into a mud bog, Bryce wonders if he’ll get to race at all.

programme.title: Making the jump
programme.desc: Follow UCI World Cup rookies Finn Iles and Kate Courtney as they make the step up to elite-level racing. Follow two UCI World Cup rookies – 2017 cross-country U23 champion Kate Courtney and 2017 junior downhill champion Finn Iles – as they make the step up to elite-level racing. The pair quickly realise the benefits of hindsight and experience.

programme.title: Winning takes confidence
programme.desc: Hear from Kate Courtney and Finn Iles's rivals about what it takes to be the very best. As World Cup rookies Kate Courtney and Finn Iles prepare for their second pro events, hear from their rivals about what it takes to be the very best in a sport where consistency and confidence are key.

programme.title: Perfect Space
programme.desc: Cyclist Danny MacAskill carries the Olympic Torch in Glasgow, Scotland, and searches for a film location. It's a once-in-a-lifetime honour for Danny MacAskill as he rides the Olympic Torch through the packed streets of Glasgow, Scotland. Work of his film project goes on with the search for a location yielding a surprisingly perfect space.

programme.title: Time to Ride
programme.desc: Pressure mounts for Danny as he prepares for the big shoot with ambitious new tricks and a custom built set. In the six months leading up to the film shoot, Danny rides almost every day in the space, though it's still under construction by the ever-growing team. It's the biggest creative and physical challenge of his life, but he's energized to take it on.

programme.title: Fuse
programme.sub-title: The History of Belgium's Premier Techno Club
programme.desc: At Fuse, a nightclub in Brussels, Belgium, everyone has the same unwritten purpose: enjoying techno music. Fuse is a nightclub in Brussels, Belgium where people can indulge their passion for techno freely, without having to think about the way they behave, dress or dance. Everyone in there has the same unwritten purpose: enjoying the music.

programme.title: Going In
programme.sub-title: An up-close look at Trek’s MTB athletes
programme.desc: This is the story of what it takes to compete at the highest level of professional mountain bike racing. Get up close and personal with Trek’s MTB athletes as they experience the highs and lows of training, racing and living for the sport they love.

programme.title: Play and practice
programme.desc: Jump into the action of day one of the US Open in California with Kanoa Igarashi. Jump into the action of day one of the US Open in California with Kanoa Igarashi. Then it's off to the wave pool to play and practice before the next big event.

programme.title: Keeping up with Kanoa
programme.desc: Following his win in Bali, surfer Kanoa Igarashi takes the energy of success to Margaret River, Australia. Following his win at the 2019 Corona Bali Protected, Japanese-American surfer Kanoa Igarashi tries to harness the momentum at Margaret River, Western Australia. But things don’t exactly go as planned.

programme.title: Kilimanjaro Free Fall
programme.desc: Follow Valery Rozov in his attempt to be the first person to BASE jump off the summit of Mt Kilimanjaro. BASE jumping legend Valery Rozov has flown off the highest points of three continents and now has his sights set on Africa's Mt Kilimanjaro, 5,460m above sea level. Many have climbed the giant, but he wants to be the first to jump off it.

programme.title: Frozen Falls
programme.desc: Will Gadd takes ice climbing to new heights as the first person to ascend North America’s Niagara Falls. Professional climber and one of National Geographic’s Adventurers of the Year, Will Gadd takes ice climbing to new heights as the first person to ascend the frozen sections of the world’s largest flowing waterfall at North America’s Niagara Falls.

programme.title: The KTM shock factor
programme.desc: The KTM team is back at it in the first few days in Saudi Arabia for the 2020 Dakar Rally. It's the first days in Saudi Arabia for the 2020 Dakar Rally. The KTM team is back at it and it seems there's something feeling quite ticklish on Sam Sunderland's bike. What's that? We'll let you discover.

programme.title: Engine trouble
programme.desc: In the latest Rally Raid vlog from Dakar, the Red Bull crew work all night to replace an engine. Check out the latest Rally Raid vlog as the Red Bull crew work through the night to do a complete engine swap of Cyril Despres and Mike Horn's OT3.

programme.title: A tragic loss
programme.desc: The bivouac is in shock at the tragic death of motorcycle rider Paulo Gonçalves on stage 7 of the Dakar Rally. The bivouac is in shock at the death of motorcycle rider Paulo Gonçalves on stage 7. Toby Price, one of the first riders at the scene of the crash, pays tribute and explains the decision to keep racing.
